Text: Thank you! This is the first year in a long time I have not had to wait in a huge line. :) I am going to donate 10 bucks to each charity. Probably more then they would have received if I would have purchased 2 discs. Thanks again!
As of about noon, all stores still had them, no line...  I got there much later than last year, 7:am :-).  Have a great holiday!
you must like live in Denver
